summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3674 , for the improvement of the alley in block 13, Pontius' 4th Addition, being the alley between Pontius Avenue and Yale Avenue North, from Denny Way to John Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45272 , and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
